Text: Hi, It works great, everythings fine, but I have a problem: When I look through all the files for the downloaded result and I can't find "server.properties" I am dying to play multiplayer any help would be very much appreciated!
Start the server.exe and it'l make some files in the folder it is in. Then you can edit the properties.
My comment isnt showing up, start server.exe it will make propertes edit it.

The server.properties file is only for multiplayer
once you go to 
http://www.minecraft.net/download.jsp
and download it there should be a MinecraftServer.exe. once you click on this it will create the server.properties file that you need to edit to use multiplayer
Oh, and if your using a Mac/Linux based operating system, you have to download the appropriate version for your OS.
When I download the server tool, and I start it, it asks me to log in. But I don't have an account (obviously). IS there anyone else with this problem?

@Aldojasp make sure your downloading the server starting software and not the normal minecraft software that legit users use to connect

its towards the bottom of the page
